name: Krishna Kshirsagar
position: Data Scientist at Bayer  |  IIT Kharagpur
about: I am an experienced Data Scientist specializing in solving real-world business challenges across diverse industries. My expertise includes advanced natural language processing techniques and extensive hands-on experience with AWS cloud services. I have a proven track record of deploying multiple machine learning models into production, delivering measurable value by transforming complex data into actionable business insights.

current_company.name: Bayer
current_company.title: Data Scientist at Bayer  |  IIT Kharagpur

experience.title: Machine Learning Engineer
experience.description: Developed and deployed a Bert model in production for named entity recognition and multi-label text classification using Hugging Face, TensorFlow, and PyTorch.Proficient in AWS cloud services, including:  - AWS Lambda  - AWA Fargate  - AWS Step Functions  - AWS Textract  - AWS SageMaker  - AWS Elastic Container Registry (ECR)  - AWS Simple Storage Service (S3)
